title: Got fucked over... damn

replies.body:
i have a friend who never leaves games....infact he cant. he doesnt play any games. because he is a massive troll and just dodges games at the last second once every few days when he is bored. mostly ranked 5s team games to piss off the randoms in teams he offers to play for. (being gold 1, not playing doesnt harm his rank and he wont play properly till end of season if he goes for plat)

he has LPQ and CBF playing to stop it.
